thread.title: Who gets sent home if the government shuts down

title: Who gets sent home if the government shuts down
text:
22 Who gets sent home if the government shuts down 
The Washington Post: The burden of a government shutdown would not fall evenly across federal agencies. Hereâ€™s the percentage of workers who would be furloughed at Cabinet-level departments, according to contingency plans that are based on projections during the 16-day shutdown in 2013.Agencies are currently updating those plans, and the number of employees who would be sent home could go up or down, depending on the federal office.
